name: chordium-monorepo
description: A modern, minimalist chord viewer for beginner guitarists and hobbyists. View guitar chords without visual distractions.

scripts.dev: npm run dev:fe & npm run dev:be
scripts.build: npm run build:fe && npm run build:be
scripts.test: npm run test:fe && npm run test:be
scripts.lint: npm run lint:fe && npm run lint:be
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/coverage backend/coverage
